pair.intro:
You can enter a specific fine dust sensor here. You can find out the sensor ID on http://maps.luftdaten.info/ 
Please enter the number without #.
pair.title: Add PM Sensor
pair.nosettings: Please fill in all the required fields.
pair.notfound: Sensor ID not found or no data
pair.notreachable: The Luftdaten API is not reachable. Please try again later.
